:loudspeaker: *Public Service Announcement from Sandboxes*

On June 28th we rolled out a fix to address the following bug:

When users with a portal located in the EU region created a development or Standard sandbox using the CLI, some scopes were missing causing the CLI to throw a permission error.

_This issue was fixed on June 28th._ 

If you see any new errors, please don't hesitate to let us know. Your feedback will help us continue to evolve Sandboxes :thank-you:
